original_text:
Deliverers will go up on Mount Zion
    to govern the mountains of Esau.
    And the kingdom will be the Lord’s.
korean_text: 구원 받은 자들이 시온 산에 올라와서 에서의 산을 심판하리니 나라가 여호와께 속하리라

sentences.original_text: Deliverers will go up on Mount Zion
to govern the mountains of Esau
And the kingdom will be the Lord's
